name: tm67
effect: Teaches Recycle to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Retaliate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Recycle)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. The attack never misses.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. The attack never misses.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. The attack never misses.
